definition: to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
to take to one's heels/to scram
to sit cross-legged/to sit in the lotus position
one leg over the other (legs crossed)

sentences.english: His old legs and shoulders pivoted with the swinging of the pulling.
sentences.chinese: 他一把把地拉着，两条老迈的腿儿和肩膀跟着转动。

sentences.english: Ohhh, I think I broke my leg.
A critic is a legless man who teaches running.
sentences.chinese: 批评家，是教人跑步的无腿的人。

sentences.english: He has very thin legs and knobbly knees.
sentences.chinese: 他腿很细，膝盖呈圆球状突出。

sentences.english: Long grass tickled their legs like creepy crawlies.
sentences.chinese: 长长的草像蠕动的爬虫使他们腿发痒。

sentences.english: It has saved my post-shave legs from irritation and allowed me to wear shorts all summer long.
sentences.chinese: 它救了我的后刮胡子腿从刺激和允许我穿短裤夏天长。

sentences.english: My leg smarted from the bee sting.
Bandy legs and fiddle front are objectionable.
sentences.chinese: 弯曲的前腿和提琴前腿都属于缺陷。

sentences.english: Without this device, a lot of drivers would have very tired legs.
sentences.chinese: 没有制动助力器那么司机的腿会非常疲劳。

sentences.english: Not being able to manage both your Skis can be due to your left and right sides which are aligned differently.
sentences.chinese: 控制不好板子可能是因为你的左右腿型不一致。

sentences.english: The dog has nipped the postmen on the leg.
sentences.chinese: 这条狗咬了邮递员的腿。

sentences.english: I think my legs look stocky , so I rarely wear such short shorts.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我的腿很粗，所以很少穿这么短的裤子。

sentences.english: I tripped over the leg that stuck out.
sentences.chinese: 我被什么人伸出腿绊了一跤。

sentences.english: The student was saved but Roberts leg fractured in two places.
sentences.chinese: 那名学生得救了，但因此罗伯特的腿两处骨折。

sentences.english: How to let children have such a good pair of legs, rather the responsibility of parents.
sentences.chinese: 怎样让孩子有这样一双好腿，父母颇有责任。

definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
